content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetUser path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/identity/v1/users/{user_id} content: params
name userid
desc a user id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum get a user
responses
200
identitygetuserresponse
type obj
identityuser
type obj
props
id
type str
desc a users unique identifier
email
type str
desc a users email address

email addresses are used as login names to the stackpath customer portal
identityuserstatus
type str
default unknown
desc a users status

 unknown stackpath is unable to determine a users status
  enabled a user is enabled and can log into their stackpath services
  disabled a user is disabled and cannot log into the stackpath customer portal or place api calls
identities
type arr
identityuseridentity
type obj
props
type str
identityprovider
type obj
props
id
type str
desc an identity providers unique identidier
name
type str
desc an identity providers name
desc an identity provider

identity providers handle user authentication to the stackpath customer portal they can be third party like google or facebook or stackpath can provide identity resources for users
desc a users underlying authentication identities
accounts
type arr
identityaccount
type obj
props
id
type str
desc a stackpath accounts unique identifier
parentid
type str
desc the id of an account that a stackpath account may belong to
name
type str
desc a stackpath accounts name
rootuserid
type str
desc the id of a stackpath accounts primary user
createdat
type str
format datetime
desc the date a stackpath account was created
updatedat
type str
format datetime
desc the date a stackpath account was last updated
desc a stackpath account

an account is the topmost entity in the stackpath ecosystem accounts are associated with users and stacks which in turn are associated with purchased products and services
desc the accounts that a user belongs to
name
type str
desc a users name
phonenumber
type str
desc a users phone number
desc a user account

users can interact with the stackpath customer portal and api
desc a response from a request to retrieve a stackpath user account
title: 32_Users_GetUser_180.json
